GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.19 to before v4.14.106
GSD.description:
netlabel: fix out-of-bounds memory accesses

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.106 by commit fcfe700acdc1c72eab231300e82b962bac2b2b2c, it was introduced in version v2.6.19 by commit 446fda4f26822b2d42ab3396aafcedf38a9ff2b6. For more details please see the references link.
